sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import Head from 'next/head' import PaginationStyles from './styles/PaginationStyles' import Link from 'next/link' import gql from 'graphql-tag' import { useQuery } from '@apollo/client' import DisplayError from './ErrorMessage' import {perPage} from '../config' const PAGINATION_QUERY = gql` query PAGINATION_QUERY{ _allProductsMeta{ count } } ` const Pagination = ({page}) => { const {error, loading, data} = useQuery(PAGINATION_QUERY) if(loading) return null if(error) return const { count } = data._allProductsMeta const pageCount = Math.ceil(count / perPage) return ( NargoreShop - Страница {page} ‹ Назад

Страница {page} из {pageCount}

Всего товаров {count}

Вперед › ) } export default Pagination
